productDescription: Shoot. Share. Impress. Introducing, the debut of a camera offering quality your photos deserve; the EOS Rebel T7 from Canon, is ideal for smartphone or digital point-and-shoot camera users seeking to enhance their imaging game. Stepping up with an impressive 24.1 Megapixel CMOS image sensor, the T7 produces highly detailed, vibrant stills and videos even in difficult situations. It offers an advanced 9-point AF, extended ISO of 12800, and 3fps continuous shooting. With full HD 1080p 30fps video recording you get dazzling videos and with the built-in Wi-Fi and NFC, you can now share your favorite photos easily with friends, family, and the world to enjoy. The DIGIC 4+ Image Processor ensures a smooth and natural shooting experience and you can compose imagery with the bright optical viewfinder or large LCD screen. The EOS Rebel T7 is easy to use, simple to share with, and delivers image quality that's sure to inspire.
Get ready to start capturing breathtaking pictures like a pro.

Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Lens provides a 28.8-88mm equivalent focal length and features an aspherical element and an Optical Image Stabilizer for enhanced clarity and sharpness in every shot.
Canon EF 75-300 f/4-5.6 III Lens extends the zoom range even further with a 120-480mm equivalent focal length. This lens boasts a DC autofocus motor and is ideal for capturing distant subjects.

The EOS Rebel T7 camera can help mobile device users take their photography to the next level. With a large 24.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor, fast autofocus, built-in wireless connectivity and more, it combines fantastic features with easy operation for high-quality images you'll be proud to share.
The large, high-resolution 24.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor helps capture rich details and vibrant colors.
The DIGIC 4+ Image Processor creates fast performance and reduces image noise, even in low light.
The EOS Rebel T7 camera features fast and accurate autofocus, which can enhance your shooting experience by making sure you're ready to capture the action as soon as it happens.
Capture breathtaking Full HD quality video in a variety of recording sizes and frame rates, including 30p for a natural look. The camera's wide ISO range means confident shooting in nearly any light.
The EOS Rebel T7 camera's Optical Viewfinder lets you quickly line up and capture a photo in virtually any situation. It also helps you accurately see what the lens sees, even in bright sunlight.
Scene Intelligent Auto mode delivers accurate exposure and enhancements to help bring out the beauty in virtually any scene, so you can concentrate on composing images without puzzling over settings.
Use your compatible smart device to control the camera remotely for great self-portraits and more.
Built-in Wi-Fi Certified and NFC allow for easy sharing & connection to your compatible devices.

reviews.reviewTitle: OUTSTANDING FOR ZOOMING IN ON ACTION SHOTS!
reviews.reviewText: I took these three photos of Remote Control Sailplanes flying in the air with my new Canon T7 the day after receiving it! I could not possibly be happier with the way it zooms and sharply autofocuses precisely on the moving target I'm trying to get a photo of! All of the accessories are outstanding and will be put to use too. Delivery was days sooner than expected and that was very much appreciated! The price was right as well, I couldn't be happier and glad I didn't wait any longer!

I’m very excited to finally find and decide on a great camera bundle! I got everything that came in the bundle to fit in the camera bag except for the cleaning kit (which I could probably get to fit but I decided to leave it all in it’s original box) and the tripod of course (which comes in its own case). I haven’t really got the chance to play with all that the camera is capable of doing, but I can’t wait to start using it more and advance my photography skills. It was a little difficult to use at first but got easier as I got to play around on it. There’s still a lot to learn of course so I also purchased the “Canon EOS Rebel T7 for dummies” to go along with my bundle. The last two pictures I provided were both taken with this camera, the quality is great and the camera is lightweight and easy to hold. So if you’re having a hard time deciding on a bundle, this is a great one to go with. The only thing I’m not too thrilled about is that this bundle only comes with 1 battery so I also purchased an extra battery pack to go along with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use, patience to understand
reviews.reviewText: I am still learning how to use it because there are alot of different settings but this is a wonderful camera! Everything came that was promised with it. The picture quality is beautiful and the actual ease of switching out lenses is simple. I would recommend it but be prepared to actually read the manual to receive the best quality photo for different events or scenery.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great package deal for a really great camera and goodies!
reviews.reviewText: This is my first DSLR... I'm old school. Not much use for my old Pentax K1000, didn't find a Pentax to my liking so I could use my lenses. Transitioning from a point and shoot 4 megapixel camera. Can't wait to see what I can shoot with all the optional lenses and filters! Canon is a nice product. It's great that this package comes with actual Canon lenses- not knock-offs. Curious how the wide angle and macro lens will perform (not Canon). The only thing I would have invested in is a better tripod- this one is a bit tippy even with weights. Purchased a different camera bag- personal preference.

I am truly obsessed with this camera. I am happy that I chose the kit, as it allows so many options. I have captured the moon, I’ve captured beautiful macros, and I’m looking forward to getting some sport shots. The slave glad included does not seem to be compatible with this camera, I can’t seem to get it to work, so, I will have to spend a good pretty hefty amount of money to get a quality flash that is compatible and works well. I recommend for beginners.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great camera package for the price.
reviews.reviewText: This is an awesome package for the price. Only issue I have is the external flash that came with the package is not compatible with the camera. The camera has 4 contact pins, and the flash only has 1 that doesn't line up with anything. Other than that, this camera takes awesome pictures and I am extremely pleased with this purchase.
I use it for taking pictures at the rodeo and it works perfectly!
There are no negatives to report. The camera is easy to use and takes INCREDIBLE photos!
This camera is amazing ! I’m still finding my way around it but i know it’ll take some time. The picture quality is amazing ! Everything in the box is wonderful !
Gift for my wife. She loves it. Pretty good deal for all you get with it.
Pictures are so clear, just has a learning curve on what all the stuff is and how to use each one. I also need time to practice.
Great camera

reviews.reviewTitle: Great purchase, great camera, easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I love my new TOY!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Start off with a basic camera and move on to a next level camera.
reviews.reviewText: This bundle is great for beginners! My advice t you is to start off with an entry level camera, rather than a confused medium-level camera. The cannon T7 has the same image sensor as the 80d and T7i
Great college gift
Me encanto, todo súper bien las cosas llegaron 100%👌🏻, estoy como loco con mi cámara todos los productos son de calidad, lo recomiendo mucho y tiene un excelente servicio 👍🏻
good beginner camera and this bundle has everything you’d need plus more for a great price

reviews.reviewTitle: Make your life more happy by taking pictures with a CANON T7
reviews.reviewText: I like everything on this camera,best quality product on this price. Maybe the camera could have the mic input, it could be better,în rest it is very good.I am very happy in have it. Thanks.

reviews.reviewTitle: Surprised by the quality at the price
reviews.reviewText: WOW. That's all I can say. Definitely worth the money.
So far so good! Very easy to learn and use.
I like it and i used for pictures
Great product
It is good product!

qAndA.question: Do the telephoto lens and the wide angle attach to the camera or to the other lens?
qAndA.answer: The smaller Telefonica and wide angle/macro lenses attach to the lens, you can see small threads just inside the lens that they screw on to, don’t screw on too hard. That is also the same place to attach the filters.

qAndA.question: Does this bundle come with a macro lense?
qAndA.answer: Yes, and it works great too!

qAndA.question: Does it have a flip screen
qAndA.answer: Unfortunately I can not It was such an advanced set that I returned it. It was fabulous but way above my level

qAndA.question: Does it come in a original canon box? (Original packaging)
qAndA.answer: Yes. The one I purchased came in the original Canon box.

qAndA.question: Aside from wrist strap is there a neck strap or wide shoulder strap?
qAndA.answer: The bundle I purchased came with a neck strap. It has held up well but I will probably upgrade to something nicer, as in more comfortable later.

qAndA.question: Is this camera also able to manually adjust focus?
qAndA.answer: Yes..includes auto and manual focus..manual confurms..'If you want to achirve precise focus, set the lens's ficus mode switch to <MF>, magnify the image, and focus manually'

qAndA.question: Does this package include a battery and charger?
qAndA.answer: Yes

qAndA.question: Do the lenses have covers
qAndA.answer: Yes

qAndA.question: do you need a sim card to work this camera
qAndA.answer:
It comes with 2 SD cards. Everything I needed to use and download the photos to my computer comes in the bundle, plus a lot of stuff I haven't needed or dont yet know how to use.
Very pleased with this purchase.

qAndA.question: Does this package include a battery and charger?
qAndA.answer: Yes it does. One battery and one charger.

qAndA.question: Does this package include a battery and charger?
qAndA.answer: Yes

qAndA.question: Does this package include a battery and charger?
qAndA.answer: Yes

qAndA.question: Is there a sport mode?
qAndA.answer: Yes, there is a "Sport" mode for shooting fast moving objects and it allows multiple photos quickly by simply continuing to hold down the shutter button. There are many mode settings available including fully Manual.

qAndA.question: What is the best option for capturing sports action shots?
qAndA.answer: You can either do manual and choose your own shutter speed

qAndA.question: Does the flash come with it
qAndA.answer: Yes it does. There are 2, one is built into the camera and you also get a separate, removable flash.

qAndA.question: return policy
Can i add microphone to this camera?
qAndA.answer: No

qAndA.question: Are any of thes Canon Rebel available via monthly payments?
qAndA.answer: This exact one is on Craigslist

qAndA.question: How is the battery life?
qAndA.answer: I've shot several hundred photos and some videos too over a three to four hour period and still had plenty of battery power left, so I can't complain!

qAndA.question: Can you share photos to a smartphone?
qAndA.answer: Yes, if it's a later model phone. IPhone 6 or above I believe

qAndA.question: Does it come with two lenses?
qAndA.answer: Yes it does!
